problem_text: Create two sine graphs: one on-time and one phase-shifted right by π/2. What’s the real-world difference?
solution_text: One starts immediately, the other lags. Reflects access delay, late rollout, or information gap.

problem_text: You model an alert system that triggers too late. How can phase shift help design a faster response?
solution_text: Use left shift to advance start. Reflect on lag cost and response optimization.

problem_text: Explain how phase shifts can model marginalization or delay in opportunity.
solution_text: Some populations are out of sync with access or support. Graph lag as horizontal delay.
